blocks.name: df-nacs
blocks.content: Define a closure system of _Noetherian type_ (not standard terminology) as an algebraic system where all closed sets are finitely generated. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-nacs(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cnacs, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, cfv(cacs, cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wrex(s3, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(s1)), cv(s3))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-nacs(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ NoeACS =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà(ACS ` s0)| ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s1, ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà(P(s0)‚ãÇ Fin), s2 =((mrCls ` s1)` s3)))})
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
}

blocks.name: isnacs
blocks.content: Expand definition of Noetherian-type closure system. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isnacs(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmrc, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  elfvex(c0, cnacs, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  elfvex(c0, cacs, c1)
  syl6bb(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, cfv(cacs, c1), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1), crab(hs0, cfv(cacs, c1), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvmpt(hs1, c1, universe, cnacs, crab(hs0, cfv(cacs, c1), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))))), crab(hs0, cfv(cacs, cv(hs1)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(cv(hs1)), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))))))
  rabeqbidv(hs0, cfv(cacs, cv(hs1)), cfv(cacs, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(cv(hs1)), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c1, cacs)
  ralbidv(s0, cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(cv(hs1)), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))))
  rexeqdv(s1, cin(cpw(cv(hs1)), cfn), cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))
  ineq1d(cpw(cv(hs1)), cfn, cpw(c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  pweq(cv(hs1), c1)
  df-nacs(hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  rabex(hs0, cfv(cacs, c1), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))))
  fvex(cacs, c1)
  elrab(hs0, c0, cfv(cacs, c1), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1)))))
  rexbidv(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))
  eqeq2d(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), cfv(c2, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1d(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cmrc, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cmrc)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, cfv(cacs, c1), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cacs, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cacs, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.cin.s(s1, cpw(cv(hs1)), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.cin.s(s1, cpw(c1), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c1)
  diff.cfn.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isnacs(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(NoeACS ` c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà(ACS ` c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =(c2 ` s1)))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(mrCls ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà(NoeACS ` c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà(ACS ` c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =(c2 ` s1))))), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà(NoeACS ` c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà(ACS ` c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =(c2 ` s1))))), d(s1, c2))
  pm5.21nii(c0 ‚àà(NoeACS ` c1), (c0 ‚àà(ACS ` c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =(c2 ` s1)))), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  elfvex(c0, cnacs, c1)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(ACS ` c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =(c2 ` s1))), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  elfvex(c0, cacs, c1)
  syl6bb(c1 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà(NoeACS ` c1), (c0 ‚àà(ACS ` c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =(c2 ` s1)))), c0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(ACS ` c1)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =((mrCls ` hs0)` s1)))})
  eleq2d(c0, (NoeACS ` c1), { hs0 ‚àà(ACS ` c1)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =((mrCls ` hs0)` s1)))}, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs1, c1, universe, cnacs, { hs0 ‚àà(ACS ` c1)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =((mrCls ` hs0)` s1)))}, { hs0 ‚àà(ACS ` hs1)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(hs1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =((mrCls ` hs0)` s1)))})
  rabeqbidv(hs0, (ACS ` hs1), (ACS ` c1), hs1 = c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(hs1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =((mrCls ` hs0)` s1))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =((mrCls ` hs0)` s1))))
  fveq2(hs1, c1, cacs)
  ralbidv(s0, hs0, hs1 = c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(hs1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =((mrCls ` hs0)` s1)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =((mrCls ` hs0)` s1)))
  rexeqdv(s1, (P(hs1)‚ãÇ Fin), (P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), hs1 = c1, s0 =((mrCls ` hs0)` s1))
  ineq1d(P(hs1), cfn, P(c1), hs1 = c1)
  pweq(hs1, c1)
  df-nacs(hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  rabex(hs0, (ACS ` c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =((mrCls ` hs0)` s1))))
  fvex(cacs, c1)
  elrab(hs0, c0, (ACS ` c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =((mrCls ` hs0)` s1))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =(c2 ` s1))))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, hs0, c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =((mrCls ` hs0)` s1)), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =(c2 ` s1)))
  rexbidv(s1, (P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), hs0 = c0, s0 =((mrCls ` hs0)` s1), s0 =(c2 ` s1))
  eqeq2d(s0, ((mrCls ` hs0)` s1), (c2 ` s1), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1d((mrCls ` hs0), s1, c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((mrCls ` hs0), c2, (mrCls ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmrc)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c({ hs0 ‚àà(ACS ` c1)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =((mrCls ` hs0)` s1)))})
  diff.hs0.c((ACS ` hs1))
  diff.hs0.c((ACS ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.cin.s(s1, P(hs1), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.cin.s(s1, P(c1), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c1)
  diff.cfn.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 =(c2 ` s1))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: nacsfg
blocks.content: In a Noetherian-type closure system, all closed sets are finitely generated. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm nacsfg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1)), wcel(c2, c0)), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmrc, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  sylan2(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1)), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cv(s0))))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)))
  isnacs(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c3)
  rspcva(hs0, c2, c0, wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  rexbidv(s0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), wceq(c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(c2, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nacsfg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(NoeACS ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0)‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), c2 =(c3 ` s0)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(mrCls ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  ancoms(c0 ‚àà(NoeACS ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), c2 =(c3 ` s0)))
  sylan2(c2 ‚àà c0, c0 ‚àà(NoeACS ` c1), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), c2 =(c3 ` s0)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), hs0 =(c3 ` s0))))
  simprbi(c0 ‚àà(NoeACS ` c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), hs0 =(c3 ` s0))), c0 ‚àà(ACS ` c1))
  isnacs(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c3)
  rspcva(hs0, c2, c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), hs0 =(c3 ` s0)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), c2 =(c3 ` s0)))
  rexbidv(s0, (P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), hs0 = c2, hs0 =(c3 ` s0), c2 =(c3 ` s0))
  eqeq1(hs0, c2, (c3 ` s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c1)‚ãÇ Fin), c2 =(c3 ` s0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: isnacs2
blocks.content: Express Noetherian-type closure system with fewer quantifiers. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isnacs2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wceq(cima(c2, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmrc, c0))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cfv(cnacs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wceq(cima(c2, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))))))
  isnacs(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))), wceq(cima(c2, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), c0))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))), wceq(cima(c2, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), c0), wss(c0, cima(c2, cin(cpw(c1), cfn))))
  syl6bbr(wcel(c0, cfv(cacs, c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))), wss(c0, cima(c2, cin(cpw(c1), cfn))), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c2, cin(cpw(c1), cfn)))))

} = {
  3impia(wral(s0, cn0, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c1)), wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)))
